tweet: The terrific @eliehonig told me he received a @cnn viewer question asking if LTC Vindman should be “Court-martialed for disloyalty to the Commander in Chief.” While not a military lawyer, as a commander I convened these legal proceedings. Here’s what I told him. 1 of 12.
